metadata.title: CVE-2013-6766 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: OpenVAS Administrator 1.2 before 1.2.2 and 1.3 before 1.3.2 allows remoteattackers to bypass the OAP authentication restrictions and execute OAPcommands via a crafted OAP request for version information, which causesthe state to be set to CLIENT_AUTHENTIC.

criterions.comment: openvas-server: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
